程序包 com.fenglinga.tinyspring.framework.websocket

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    Base64
    Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
    Base64.InputStream
    A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    Base64.OutputStream
    A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
    WebSocketCodecFactory
    Codec Factory used for creating websocket filter.
    WebSocketCodecPacket
    Defines the class whose objects are understood by websocket encoder.
    WebSocketDecoder
    Decodes incoming buffers in a manner that makes the sender transparent to the decoders further up in the filter chain.
    WebSocketEncoder
    Encodes incoming buffers in a manner that makes the receiving client type transparent to the encoders further up in the filter chain.
    WebSocketHandShakeResponse
    Wraps around a string that represents a websocket handshake response from the server to the browser.
    WebSocketUtils
    Static utility class containing methods used for websocket encoding and decoding.
